name: 1 of These Things
description:
*********************************
We've released a new game! "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power!" It's free to try so please help us celebrate by downloading "Chain of Thought 2 - Pyramid Power" today!!
*********************************

We are the husband and wife team that brought you “Chain of Thought,” and we’re proud to announce our newest word/trivia game app “1 Of These Things.”

“1 of the These Things” presents you with 4 things. Can you figure out which thing is not like the others— the one that doesn’t belong?

Sound simple, right? But be careful— these puzzles can be quite tricky!

Features:
*Exercises your brain
*Fun pop culture trivia
*100's of categories-- from sports to spices!
*Leaderboard to compare your scores with the world
*Easy to learn
*No nasty typing
*Free hints

We hope you (and your brain) enjoy “1 of These Things.” Let us know. We’d love to hear from you.

Best wishes,
Jay & Julia
